title: Got Ankle-tapped by my own minion -_-
body:
Turns out that the unit collision is so bad atm that if you are walking just in front of the minion wave, close enough that the front minion is just touching the back of your champ, it slows you down dramatically as you champ constantly tries to 'move around it' even though its moving too and its completely  behind you, it should be the one that has to move..

and it doesn't end well when theres an angry Jax coming after you..

replies.body: Just build PD on everyone, take that minions.

"builds PD on janna"

{{champion:55}}: "all/ Reportirino janna for trolling"

{{champion:40}}: "At least I wont get stuck like you did when you shunpo'd under Azir's tower"

{{champion:55}}: "STFU noob, you are trolling"

{{champion:268}} An ally has been slain{{champion:55}} 

{{champion:55}}: "all/ WTF THAT MINION"

{{champion:55}}: "all/ FFS"

{{champion:55}}: "all/ @#$#$ @#%$# I QUIT"

A summoner has disconnected {{champion:55}} 

{{champion:57}}: "what a scrub, who doesn't build pd"

"Entire team now buys pd, selling major items"

ACE! {{champion:40}} 

{{champion:40}}: "GG, winions"

{{champion:268}}: "all/ WTF IS THAT MINION BLOCK??????? YOU #%# HACKER"

{{champion:40}}: "all/ yes I hacked pd"

{{champion:268}}: "all/ pd #$#%^ op, rito nerf FFS"
PD on Jax. Never be safe.
